ygData.subject: Re: The bum and the hole...
ygData.msgSnippet: OOC: I agree with Rdahl on this personally. Weapons interceptcion is possible in BW and G1. However it was not very common. Interception should be allowed IMO

OOC: I agree with Rdahl on this personally. Weapons interceptcion is possible 
in BW and G1. However it was not very common. Interception should be allowed 
IMO however it should not be abused. maybe the council made it illegal 
because players were constantly intercepting weapons fire which I said was a 
rare occurence. Intercepting a mass amount of missiles and firing beams at 
them would be on of those times, a char could fire a bunch of times and 
detonate it which would make the otehrs detonate. However, if one were to try 
to blow up lazer blasts with missiles... well that would be pretty dumb. 
Weapons intercepticon should be allowed however limited. Players should be 
knowledgeable(is that a word?) enough too to know that a char can't intercept 
nearly every blast fired at their char. No charachter has god like accuracy 
and not every shot in BW hit either. Well thats just my two cents.

--part1_e8.1589f34f.2847eb80_boundary
Content-Type: text/html; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit
